Text:
Camera
Red Epic, Zeiss Ultra Prime and Angenieux Optimo Lenses

Film negative format (mm/video inches)
Redcode RAW

Cinematographic process
Digital Intermediate (2K) (master format)
Redcode RAW (5K) (dual-strip 3-D) (source format)

Printed film format
35 mm (spherical) (Kodak Vision 2383)
D-Cinema (also 3-D version)

Aspect ratio
1.85 : 1
from what I saw the 3D wasn't worth it. The Avengers was converted but it still looked great.
